title: League Client won't start
body: It worked fine right after the patch updated, now I can't even get it to open. the process will appear in task manager but it sits there at 00 Cpu usage and 2K memory and then disappears. I've restarted, I've run the hextech tool, I've shut off my firewall, I've shut off my anti-virus, I've made sure there were exceptions for league on there. Nothing has worked thus far.

replies.body:
It really sounds like this is a permissions/admin related error, since League seems to be trying to open and then something is killing the program. Do me a favor and run through these steps in the screenshot linked below, and let me know if it helps or not.

https://i.gyazo.com/c8a99cb4e8a9c4e36edaf6de659d9031.png
Have you tried running it as an administrator?
yep, it gets to 3k memory and then disappears as opposed to 2k.
Okay try going into your Local disk > Riot Games > League of Legends > Rads > Projects > league_client > releases > 0.0.0.111 > deploy > And try opening LeagueClient(exe)
